item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, February 21, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple pulls data protection tool after UK government security row (769 points | 612 comments)

29. Neo Gamma (Home Humanoid) (14 points | 13 comments)
